original_text: Then the man of God was angry with him and said, “You should have struck five or six times; then you would have struck down Syria until you had made an end of it, but now you will strike down Syria only three times.”
korean_text: 하나님의 사람이 노하여 이르되 왕이 대여섯 번을 칠 것이니이다 그리하였더면 왕이 아람을 진멸하기까지 쳤으리이다 그런즉 이제는 왕이 아람을 세 번만 치리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the man of God was angry with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님의 사람이 그에게 화를 내고

sentences.original_text: You should have struck five or six times;
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다섯 번이나 여섯 번을 쳐야 했는데;

sentences.original_text: then you would have struck down Syria until you had made an end of it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 네가 시리아를 완전히 멸망시킬 때까지 쳤을 것이지만,

sentences.original_text: but now you will strike down Syria only three times.”
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너는 시리아를 단 세 번만 칠 것이다.”
